Device_OM_Laezel_COM.synopsis: |COM branch for Laezel interacting with the Zaith'isk. She is convinced the machine is there to cure her and refuses to open her eyes to the reality that it's killing her. The player can intervene and stop it, or let it play out. Eventually, the device explodes and the doctor calls the guards.|
Device_OM_Laezel_COM.how_to_trigger: |Interact with the Device dialog after speaking to the doctor.|

Device_OM_Laezel_COM_78.speaker: Narrator
Device_OM_Laezel_COM_78.text: *The device is strange, made of taut flesh and pockmarked metal. It waits for something.*

Device_OM_Laezel_COM_171.speaker: Lae'zel
Device_OM_Laezel_COM_171.text: The zaith'isk. Vlaakith's purity, distilled. My duty. My right.

Device_OM_Laezel_COM_35.speaker: Player
Device_OM_Laezel_COM_35.text: Go ahead, Lae'zel. You've earned it.

Device_OM_Laezel_COM_32.speaker: Lae'zel
Device_OM_Laezel_COM_32.text: I will not. I gave you my might. You will respect my charge.

Device_OM_Laezel_COM_188.speaker: Player
Device_OM_Laezel_COM_188.text: Very well. Step forward and be cleansed.

Device_OM_Laezel_COM_27.speaker: Lae'zel
Device_OM_Laezel_COM_27.text: Praise Vlaakith, let it be done.

Device_OM_Laezel_COM_214.speaker: Ghustil Stornugoss
Device_OM_Laezel_COM_214.text: You are infected too, child? Sit, ra'stil. Let the zaith'isk end your suffering.

Device_OM_Laezel_COM_162.speaker: Ghustil Stornugoss
Device_OM_Laezel_COM_162.text: You are the infected one, child? Sit, ra'stil. Let the zaith'isk end your suffering.

Device_OM_Laezel_COM_161.speaker: Ghustil Stornugoss
Device_OM_Laezel_COM_161.text: Sit, child. Let the zaith'isk end your suffering.

Device_OM_Laezel_COM_88.context: CinematicNodeContext: Laezel lays down in the Zaith'isk.Maybe just focus on Laezel and remove the player entirely.

Device_OM_Laezel_COM_47.context:
CinematicNodeContext: The 'head' part of the machine descends and the jaws clamp around the Laezel's head, neck, shoulders.

She remains still, calm, accepting of the restraints.

Device_OM_Laezel_COM_178.speaker: Ghustil Stornugoss
Device_OM_Laezel_COM_178.text: You must focus on the parasite at all times. The zaith'isk will do the rest.
Device_OM_Laezel_COM_178.context: CinematicNodeContext: The doctor fusses, checks everything is set up correctly.NodeContext: Instructive - this is very important

Device_OM_Laezel_COM_99.context: CinematicNodeContext: A psychic forcefield emerges, 'locking in' Lae'zel's head to the Zaith'isk.

Device_OM_Laezel_COM_110.speaker: Narrator
Device_OM_Laezel_COM_110.text: *An unseen blade cleaves your mind in two. Impossible pain sears your bones and body in concert with Lae'zel's.*
Device_OM_Laezel_COM_110.context: CinematicNodeContext: Mind meld between player and Lae'zel. Lae'zel's face suddenly convulses as the machine starts to search through her brain. Player grips their head in excruciating pain.

Device_OM_Laezel_COM_68.speaker: Narrator
Device_OM_Laezel_COM_68.text: *The zaith'isk's psionic forces batter Lae'zel's thoughts. There is no chance she will survive this unscathed.*

Device_OM_Laezel_COM_91.speaker: Lae'zel
Device_OM_Laezel_COM_91.text: Ngh! Vlaakith tavki na'zin. Vlaakith tavki na'zin!
Device_OM_Laezel_COM_91.context:
CinematicNodeContext: |A psionic forcefield emerges, 'locking in' Laezel's head to the Zaith'isk.
Laezel's face is a picture of discomfort. - Reuse |  NodeContext: VLAH-kith TAHV-key nah-ZINN. Lae'zel reacts to the initial pain, then chants a meditation phrase, trying to stay calm in the face of the coming agony.

Device_OM_Laezel_COM_64.speaker: Ghustil Stornugoss
Device_OM_Laezel_COM_64.text: Yes, child. Speak the Tla'ket. Meditate on its verses.
Device_OM_Laezel_COM_64.context: NodeContext: teh-LAH-keht. A mantra of sorts.

Device_OM_Laezel_COM_114.speaker: Narrator
Device_OM_Laezel_COM_114.text: *You feel Lae'zel's mind rip and rupture. Is this purification? Is this the cure?*
Device_OM_Laezel_COM_114.context: CinematicNodeContext: Show Laezel turning into a braindead zombie

Device_OM_Laezel_COM_79.speaker: Player
Device_OM_Laezel_COM_79.text: Get out of there, Lae'zel. You won't survive this anguish.

Device_OM_Laezel_COM_76.speaker: Lae'zel
Device_OM_Laezel_COM_76.text: No! Vlaakith, purge me of this blight!

Device_OM_Laezel_COM_50.speaker: Player
Device_OM_Laezel_COM_50.text: Call on your parasite. Show Lae'zel what she stands to lose.

Device_OM_Laezel_COM_26.speaker: Player
Device_OM_Laezel_COM_26.text: Extract yourself. Mother Gith would not wish you to suffer.

Device_OM_Laezel_COM_80.speaker: Lae'zel
Device_OM_Laezel_COM_80.text: Mother Gith is sovereign no longer!

Device_OM_Laezel_COM_186.speaker: Player
Device_OM_Laezel_COM_186.text: Plead with the doctor. Lae'zel is in great pain.

Device_OM_Laezel_COM_2.speaker: Ghustil Stornugoss
Device_OM_Laezel_COM_2.text: The zaith'isk is working as intended.

Device_OM_Laezel_COM_31.speaker: Lae'zel
Device_OM_Laezel_COM_31.context: NodeContext: In great pain, still exclaiming

Device_OM_Laezel_COM_213.speaker: Player
Device_OM_Laezel_COM_213.text: Endure, Lae'zel. The cure is worth the torment.

Device_OM_Laezel_COM_11.speaker: Lae'zel
Device_OM_Laezel_COM_11.text: The cure! Vlaakith m' zath'ak, isk'a'zaith!
Device_OM_Laezel_COM_11.context: NodeContext: In great pain, still exclaiming/praying to Vlaakith. VLAH-kith mm zah-THOCK, isk-ah-ZAYTH! Abomination to Vlaakith, be purified!

Device_OM_Laezel_COM_168.speaker: Narrator
Device_OM_Laezel_COM_168.text: *You share in Lae'zel's agony. Every cell within her skull bursts into a constellation of fragments, sorted and reassembled. Lae'zel will die if she remains.*
Device_OM_Laezel_COM_168.context: CinematicNodeContext: Mind meld with Lae'zel. Player in absolute agony.

Device_OM_Laezel_COM_210.speaker: Ghustil Stornugoss
Device_OM_Laezel_COM_210.text: Yes, child. Ch'mar, zal'a Vlaakith. Call to your queen!
Device_OM_Laezel_COM_210.context: NodeContext: cheh-MAR ZAL-ah VLAH-kith. Vlaakith's will above all. Spoken with increasing furor.

Device_OM_Laezel_COM_147.speaker: Astarion
Device_OM_Laezel_COM_147.text: So... we're just going to stand here and let it kill her? Is that the plan?

Device_OM_Laezel_COM_70.speaker: Wyll
Device_OM_Laezel_COM_70.text: That thing's killing her. Do something, damn it!

Device_OM_Laezel_COM_115.speaker: Gale
Device_OM_Laezel_COM_115.text: That thing looks set to kill her!

Device_OM_Laezel_COM_28.speaker: Karlach
Device_OM_Laezel_COM_28.text: Get her away from that thing - now!

Device_OM_Laezel_COM_135.speaker: Narrator
Device_OM_Laezel_COM_135.text: *Your vision narrows. You sense myriad spectres of githyanki past. This is their fate. This is their anguish.*

Device_OM_Laezel_COM_40.speaker: Player
Device_OM_Laezel_COM_40.text: I've seen the truth, Lae'zel. This device doesn't cure - it kills.

Device_OM_Laezel_COM_54.speaker: Lae'zel
Device_OM_Laezel_COM_54.text: Lies! Vlaakith, my Queen - COMPLETE ME!

Device_OM_Laezel_COM_123.speaker: Lae'zel
Device_OM_Laezel_COM_123.context: NodeContext: Lae'zel in absolute torture.  lahsh-ah-KLAH! Make me pure!

Device_OM_Laezel_COM_106.speaker: Narrator
Device_OM_Laezel_COM_106.text: *Your marrow quakes within your bones. Behind the pain, a new sensation rises: power.*

Device_OM_Laezel_COM_182.speaker: Player
Device_OM_Laezel_COM_182.text: I have seen the truth, Lae'zel. You will be killed, not cured!

Device_OM_Laezel_COM_17.speaker: Lae'zel
Device_OM_Laezel_COM_17.text: Lies! Vlaakith, my Queen - COMPLETE ME!

Device_OM_Laezel_COM_122.speaker: Player
Device_OM_Laezel_COM_122.text: Your tadpole is changing, growing. You have to resist the machine!

Device_OM_Laezel_COM_170.speaker: Lae'zel
Device_OM_Laezel_COM_170.text: I - I - yes. I feel it. Splitting. Burning. NGH!
Device_OM_Laezel_COM_170.context: NodeContext: In great pain but resisting.

Device_OM_Laezel_COM_172.speaker: Lae'zel
Device_OM_Laezel_COM_172.text: I will not turn from my queen! EXALTED VLAAKITH. I AM RESTORED!

Device_OM_Laezel_COM_4.speaker: Player
Device_OM_Laezel_COM_4.text: Focus your mind. Try to overload the device.

Device_OM_Laezel_COM_71.speaker: Narrator
Device_OM_Laezel_COM_71.text: *Your thoughts weave through the zaith'isk's psionic pathways, turning its own power against it.*
Device_OM_Laezel_COM_71.context: CinematicNodeContext: The player squints hard, trying to overload the zaith'isk. The head of the zaith'isk lifts from Lae'zel's.

Device_OM_Laezel_COM_195.context: CinematicNodeContext: Laezel closes her eyes, grits her teeth, extrene extortion all over her face, and leaps from the machine.

Device_OM_Laezel_COM_128.context: CinematicNodeContext: |We see the forcefield recede, then expand out suddenly. In a burst of bright light, the Zaith'isk explodes. The player and Laezel have been blown aside by the explosion. The mind meld between player and Lae'zel is broken.

Device_OM_Laezel_COM_18.speaker: Lae'zel
Device_OM_Laezel_COM_18.text: Damn it all, the parasite. I still feel it.

Device_OM_Laezel_COM_90.speaker: Lae'zel
Device_OM_Laezel_COM_90.text: I AM GITHYANKI. I WILL NOT BE GHAIK!

Device_OM_Laezel_COM_30.speaker: Ghustil Stornugoss
Device_OM_Laezel_COM_30.text: And yet she lives, and so does her parasite.

Device_OM_Laezel_COM_155.speaker: Narrator
Device_OM_Laezel_COM_155.text: *Her voice cuts with a fanatical edge - an obsession bordering on mania. If there's a chance the parasite lives, she wants it.*

Device_OM_Laezel_COM_148.speaker: Player
Device_OM_Laezel_COM_148.text: The parasite lives, yes. And thank goodness - it saved her.

Device_OM_Laezel_COM_111.speaker: Ghustil Stornugoss
Device_OM_Laezel_COM_111.text: And it destroyed a zaith'isk... Then its power is even more unique than I thought. I must examine it.
Device_OM_Laezel_COM_111.context: NodeContext: pondering this as she speaks

Device_OM_Laezel_COM_201.speaker: Ghustil Stornugoss
Device_OM_Laezel_COM_201.text: Since the zaith'isk did not extract it, we must resort to more traditional means.

Device_OM_Laezel_COM_8.speaker: Player
Device_OM_Laezel_COM_8.text: Your zaith'isk tried to kill Lae'zel. And failed.

Device_OM_Laezel_COM_187.speaker: Ghustil Stornugoss
Device_OM_Laezel_COM_187.context: NodeContext: pissed off - how dare you accuse her machinery of failing!

Device_OM_Laezel_COM_132.speaker: Ghustil Stornugoss
Device_OM_Laezel_COM_132.text: The only variable in this experience was you - and your parasite. And I will uncover how this happened.

Device_OM_Laezel_COM_116.speaker: Ghustil Stornugoss
Device_OM_Laezel_COM_116.text: Wait here. I will gather my tools.
Device_OM_Laezel_COM_116.context: NodeContext: She's lying - she's going to call the guards

Device_OM_Laezel_COM_169.speaker: Player
Device_OM_Laezel_COM_169.text: You're wrong. Can't you see it in her eyes? The parasite's dead.

Device_OM_Laezel_COM_22.speaker: Ghustil Stornugoss
Device_OM_Laezel_COM_22.text: Really? Then - all this destruction was a symptom of its power... Incredible.

Device_OM_Laezel_COM_21.speaker: Ghustil Stornugoss
Device_OM_Laezel_COM_21.text: I am disappointed that we could not extract it alive. It would have been an exceptional specimen.

Device_OM_Laezel_COM_23.speaker: Ghustil Stornugoss
Device_OM_Laezel_COM_23.text: In any case, the problem is resolved. Leave me. I must salvage what I can.

Device_OM_Laezel_COM_131.speaker: Ghustil Stornugoss
Device_OM_Laezel_COM_131.text: You're lying. You're protecting it. I knew it - the parasite's influence has grown. It has changed her, changed you.

Device_OM_Laezel_COM_82.speaker: Ghustil Stornugoss
Device_OM_Laezel_COM_82.text: We must extract it as soon as possible.
Device_OM_Laezel_COM_82.context: InternalNodeContext: She's going to call the guards to kill you, but doesn't want to tip you off.

Device_OM_Laezel_COM_150.speaker: Narrator
Device_OM_Laezel_COM_150.text: *There's something in her voice that goes beyond rage - curiosity, perhaps, or regret. Whatever it is, you cannot identify it.*

Device_OM_Laezel_COM_57.speaker: Lae'zel
Device_OM_Laezel_COM_57.text: What madness is this? The zaith'isk nearly destroyed me!

Device_OM_Laezel_COM_142.speaker: Narrator
Device_OM_Laezel_COM_142.text: *The device is too powerful. You hold no sway over it.*

Device_OM_Laezel_COM_120.speaker: Player
Device_OM_Laezel_COM_120.text: Pursue the visions you saw. See where they lead.

Device_OM_Laezel_COM_16.speaker: Narrator
Device_OM_Laezel_COM_16.text: *Lae'zel's life is laid bare among those that came before. Her thoughts are turned to silver thread and relayed to the Astral Sea.*

Device_OM_Laezel_COM_126.speaker: Narrator
Device_OM_Laezel_COM_126.text: *The voices of the dead cry out as one. The zaith'isk collects memories from the infected - and executes them. It is not for curing. It's for killing.*

Device_OM_Laezel_COM_15.speaker: Narrator
Device_OM_Laezel_COM_15.text: *The pain is too great. The visions flicker but refuse to come into focus.*

Device_OM_Laezel_COM_19.speaker: Player
Device_OM_Laezel_COM_19.text: Draw on the zaith'isk's power, take it as your own.

Device_OM_Laezel_COM_69.speaker: Narrator
Device_OM_Laezel_COM_69.text: *The many planes of existence stretch before you, then coalesce. You are gifted, you are cursed.*
Device_OM_Laezel_COM_69.context: CinematicNodeContext: Power courses through the player.

Device_OM_Laezel_COM_94.speaker: Narrator
Device_OM_Laezel_COM_94.text: *The zaith'isk overwhelms the both of you. The weight of the astral sea crushes your mind and spirit.*

Device_OM_Laezel_COM_137.speaker: Player
Device_OM_Laezel_COM_137.text: Embrace the pain, Lae'zel. Be pure.

Device_OM_Laezel_COM_75.speaker: Lae'zel
Device_OM_Laezel_COM_75.context: NodeContext: In the greatest agony yet.

Device_OM_Laezel_COM_139.context: CinematicNodeContext: |We see the forcefield recede, then expand out suddenly. In a burst of bright light, the Zaith'isk explodes. The player and Laezel have been blown aside by the explosion. The mind meld between player and Lae'zel is broken.

Device_OM_Laezel_COM_149.speaker: Player
Device_OM_Laezel_COM_149.text: Seek answers within the zaith'isk. What is this vision?

Device_OM_Laezel_COM_112.speaker: Player
Device_OM_Laezel_COM_112.text: You must listen! The device is changing you. You are becoming illithid.

Device_OM_Laezel_COM_34.speaker: Lae'zel
Device_OM_Laezel_COM_34.text: I feel it. Skin stretching. Mind failing. NGH!
Device_OM_Laezel_COM_34.context: NodeContext: Lae'zel in great pain but pushing through.

Device_OM_Laezel_COM_143.speaker: Player
Device_OM_Laezel_COM_143.text: Keep focused, Lae'zel. The cure is close.

Device_OM_Laezel_COM_3.speaker: Player
Device_OM_Laezel_COM_3.text: Brace your mind, Lae'zel.Vlaakith tavki na'zin. Vlaakith tavki na'zin...

Device_OM_Laezel_COM_51.speaker: Player
Device_OM_Laezel_COM_51.text: You would still be hunting for this place without my guidance. I will be cured first.

Device_OM_Laezel_COM_104.speaker: Lae'zel
Device_OM_Laezel_COM_104.text: You walk the line between confident and arrogant. A beguiling turn of events.

Device_OM_Laezel_COM_43.speaker: Lae'zel
Device_OM_Laezel_COM_43.text: I hear you and I deny you. Your turn will come.

Device_OM_Laezel_COM_145.speaker: Player
Device_OM_Laezel_COM_145.text: Out of my way. Or would you rather I split you in two and walk through the centre?

Device_OM_Laezel_COM_165.speaker: Lae'zel
Device_OM_Laezel_COM_165.text: I do so enjoy when you choose boldness over blandness.

Device_OM_Laezel_COM_196.speaker: Lae'zel
Device_OM_Laezel_COM_196.text: I'm in no mood to exchange threats. I will enter first; your time will come.

Device_OM_Laezel_COM_154.speaker: Lae'zel
Device_OM_Laezel_COM_154.text: A persuasive argument, if not the most eloquent.

Device_OM_Laezel_COM_14.speaker: Lae'zel
Device_OM_Laezel_COM_14.text: Go on, into the zaith'isk. I will follow.

Device_OM_Laezel_COM_183.speaker: Lae'zel
Device_OM_Laezel_COM_183.text: I'm not swayed by your little parlour trick. I will be cleansed; then you may follow.

Device_OM_Laezel_COM_176.speaker: Player
Device_OM_Laezel_COM_176.text: You would still be hunting for this place without my guidance. I will be cured first.

Device_OM_Laezel_COM_20.speaker: Player
Device_OM_Laezel_COM_20.text: Make way, Lae'zel. I am purging myself of this damned parasite.

Device_OM_Laezel_COM_133.speaker: Lae'zel
Device_OM_Laezel_COM_133.text: Tsk'va - contempt for power, contempt for allegiance. I am done with you.

Device_OM_Laezel_COM_134.speaker: Player
Device_OM_Laezel_COM_134.text: All right, all right. Go ahead.

Device_OM_Laezel_COM_125.speaker: Player
Device_OM_Laezel_COM_125.text: And I'm done with you. Good riddance.

Device_OM_Laezel_COM_174.speaker: Lae'zel
Device_OM_Laezel_COM_174.text: Ghustil, assist me. The istik has turned against me!
Device_OM_Laezel_COM_174.context: NodeContext: Pissed at player for not letting her go first into the purifier. tsk-VA! = SHIT!

Device_OM_Laezel_COM_62.speaker: Narrator
Device_OM_Laezel_COM_62.text: *The device is an ingenious synthesis of illithid anatomy and metal alloys. It hums with psionic energy, hinting at paths into unknown minds and unseen planes.*

Device_OM_Laezel_COM_197.speaker: Lae'zel
Device_OM_Laezel_COM_197.text: Stand aside. My time has come.

Device_OM_Laezel_COM_113.speaker: Narrator
Device_OM_Laezel_COM_113.text: *The device is part organic, part synthetic. But you can't tell how it was made, or how it works.*

Device_OM_Laezel_COM_95.speaker: Narrator
Device_OM_Laezel_COM_95.text: *The ruined device stands inert, chilling the air around it.*

Device_OM_Laezel_COM_45.speaker: Lae'zel
Device_OM_Laezel_COM_45.text: Purification is my right. I AM GITHYANKI. I WILL NOT BE GHAIK!

Device_OM_Laezel_COM_101.speaker: Player
Device_OM_Laezel_COM_101.text: Take heart. We'll find a way.

Device_OM_Laezel_COM_53.speaker: Lae'zel
Device_OM_Laezel_COM_53.text: Do not patronise me. Purity is Vlaakith's promise. This was the way.

Device_OM_Laezel_COM_200.speaker: Player
Device_OM_Laezel_COM_200.text: Calm down. You're not the only one infected, you know.

Device_OM_Laezel_COM_0.speaker: Lae'zel
Device_OM_Laezel_COM_0.text: I am the only one denied my claim.

Device_OM_Laezel_COM_12.speaker: Lae'zel
Device_OM_Laezel_COM_12.text: I have done Vlaakith's will. I will be rewarded. I must.

Device_OM_Laezel_COM_138.speaker: Player
Device_OM_Laezel_COM_138.text: Control your tongue, before I slice it out.

Device_OM_Laezel_COM_36.speaker: Lae'zel
Device_OM_Laezel_COM_36.context: NodeContext: Worked up for a moment before reasliing the player is trying to get her to calm down

Device_OM_Laezel_COM_211.speaker: Lae'zel
Device_OM_Laezel_COM_211.text: Chk. Consider your point made. Uncontrolled fury is the true warrior's bane.

Device_OM_Laezel_COM_73.speaker: Player
Device_OM_Laezel_COM_73.text: Our duty to Vlaakith remains. Control your emotion, let our queen be our focus.

Device_OM_Laezel_COM_209.speaker: Lae'zel
Device_OM_Laezel_COM_209.text: I hear wisdom in your words. Vlaakith'ka sivim hrath krash'ht.
Device_OM_Laezel_COM_209.context: NodeContext: VLAH-kith-kah SIV-im HRATH KRAHSH-het. Only in Vlaakith may we find light. Lae'zel calming down some.

Device_OM_Laezel_COM_100.speaker: Lae'zel
Device_OM_Laezel_COM_100.text: Let this be a beginning, not an end.

Device_OM_Laezel_COM_175.speaker: Lae'zel
Device_OM_Laezel_COM_175.text: Yes. This is what I was taught. Vlaakith'ka sivim... no. The chant rings hollow.
Device_OM_Laezel_COM_175.context: NodeContext: VLAH-kith-kah SIV-im. Lae'zel questioning, and stopping her prayer/chant

Device_OM_Laezel_COM_160.speaker: Lae'zel
Device_OM_Laezel_COM_160.text: I must meditate. There is much to think on.
